üéÑ‚ú® KANNA KICKBACK 6 IS BACK ‚ú®üéÑ

Year 6 of the Valley's favorite holiday smoker's party + charity toy drive üíö

üìç Ginza Restaurant, Gold Canyon
üìÖ Friday, December 6th
‚è∞ 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM
üéüÔ∏è FREE EVENT

This December, we're doing what we do best: throwing the most festive 420-friendly kickback while making the holidays brighter for local families. All toys benefit the Sojourner Center.

üéÅ THE MISSION:
Beat last year's $6,500 in toy donations. From KK3's $4,200 to KK5's $6,500, we've grown every single year. Let's make KK6 the biggest yet.

üéÖ WHAT TO EXPECT:
‚Ä¢ KannaKlaus & his elves
‚Ä¢ Special K Ring Toss game
‚Ä¢ Infamous Kanna Krew Pinata
‚Ä¢ 10+ vendor booths (glass, cannabis products, local growers)
‚Ä¢ Giveaways & raffles all day
‚Ä¢ Orange chicken & more from Ginza
‚Ä¢ 420-friendly space
‚Ä¢ VIBES

üéÅ HOW IT WORKS:
**TOY DRIVE: Nov 15 - Dec 15**
Donation boxes at dispensaries, smoke shops, and community spots across the Valley. Bring a new, unwrapped toy and get goodies & freebies at the kickback.

**THE PARTY: Dec 6, 2-6pm**
Pull up to the Kickback to celebrate with food, games, vendors, and community love.

**DELIVERY: Dec 15**
All toys delivered to Sojourner Center to help local families this holiday season.

üìç Box locations: Ginza (Gold Canyon), Fancy Pets (Tempe), Amaranth Toy Store (Apache Junction) + more coming!

Fun first. Charity always. Year 6, let's make it legendary.

Tag 3 friends who need to pull up üëá
